sentences.en: Anagram canvas is designed for men and women.
sentences.cn: 品牌图案帆布系列是为男士和女士而设计的.

sentences.en: SILENT is an anagram of LISTEN.
sentences.cn: SILENT就 是组成LISTEN的字母颠倒顺序后构成的字.

sentences.en: The number but section is all the rage the world the number anagram topic game.
sentences.cn: 数独是一款风靡世界的数字谜题游戏.

trans.tran_cn: 由颠倒字母顺序而构成的字[短语]
trans.tran_en: a word or phrase that is made by changing the order of the letters in another word or phrase
